content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage System (around position 41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Storage system with multiple chests:
  - Iron chest at (41.5, -84.5) storing coal (1600)
  - Iron chest at (41.5, -83.5) storing coal (1600)
  - Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal (800)

### Iron Smelting System (around position 46, -80)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (45.5, -79.5) containing iron ore
- Two stone furnaces:
  - First furnace at (45.0, -81.0)
  - Second furnace at (47.0, -81.0)
- Burner inserter at (46.5, -79.5) configured to move items from chest to furnaces
- Output wooden chest at (49.5, -80.5) storing iron plates (1500)

### Miscellaneous Storage
- Wooden chest at (45.5, -84.5) (empty)

ERROR TIPS
- Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces:
  - Always check if the target position is clear before attempting to place inserters
  - Consider using position checking functions to verify space availability
  - Multiple attempts were made to place inserters at positions (45.5, -80.0), (45.5, -80.25), (45.0, -79.75), (45.0, -79.5) which were already occupied

- Mining system warnings:
  - Coal mining drill is inactive due to full output chest - implement a system to manage chest contents
  - Mining drill needs fuel - implement automated refueling system

- Furnace efficiency:
  - Furnaces lack ingredients despite having fuel - ensure proper item flow from input chest to furnaces
  - Consider optimizing inserter placement and rotation to ensure smooth material transfer

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map
  - Failure modes: Attempts to place in occupied spaces
  - Success modes: Successfully places entities when space is available

Important Variables:
- first_inserter: BurnerInserter
- second_inserter: BurnerInserter
